abstract.p: Letter by Richard Greenberg asks if it is possible for newspaper's Circuits section to be published without an article that gushes about the wonders of the Palm personal digital assistants

block.p: Would it be possible to run a Circuits section without including an article that gushes about the wonders of the ubiquitous Palm personal digital assistants? How about replacing your Palm excess (News Watch, ''Movable Storage Device for Palm Users,'' June 1; News Watch, ''A Shoot-'Em-Up Game for Palm-Based Units,'' May 25) with an article or two about a technology that benefits the collective good instead of constantly promoting a technology that is so selfish and individualized?
